author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Right now, the universe is full of life and light. But over unimaginable spans of time, everything we know will end. Galaxies will fade, stars will die, and even black holes will disappear, leaving behind a cold, dark void. This is the timeline of the universe's death.

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #Cosmology #HeatDeath #SpaceScience #Astrophysics
